entry.title: Current Conditions: -19.4°C

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind becoming south 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 14 January 2023
